fields.label: Product description (extensive)
fields.name: product_description_extensive
fields.instructions: The most extensive description of your product

fields.label: Product composition availability
fields.name: product_composition_availability
fields.instructions: Do we have access to the composition of the product we offer? If not choose NO and no composition information will be displayed. If we have composition information choose YES and fill out the reuired fields

fields.label: Blend or single component
fields.name: blend_or_single_component
fields.instructions: Is it a blend (more then 1 component) or a single component

fields.label: Product composition blend
fields.name: product_composition_blend
fields.instructions: Which chemicals does the product consists of? Is it one component with 1 CAS no. or more components with more CAS numbers; all components known must be listed and with the correct %

fields.label: Product composition single component
fields.name: product_composition_single_component
fields.instructions: Which chemicals does the product consists of? Is it one component with 1 CAS no. or more components with more CAS numbers; all components known must be listed and with the correct %

fields.label: Datasheet availability
fields.name: datasheet_availability
fields.instructions: Do we have sufficient specifications availble from the supplier?  If not choose NO and no specification information will be displayed. If we have sufficient specification information choose YES and fill out the reuired fields

fields.label: Product specifications
fields.name: product_specifications_&_certifcate_of_analysis
fields.instructions: Collected data from all specs given by the suppliers covered in one general spec covering the spcs from the single suppliers

sub_fields.label: Product specification
sub_fields.name: product_specification
sub_fields.instructions:
Fill out like this: 
NumberNumber,NumberNumber min or max = 99,00 min

If it is a range fill out like this:
NumberNumber,NumberNumber-NumberNumber,NumberNumber = 126,00-131,89

fields.label: Shelf life (months)
fields.name: shelf_life_months
fields.instructions: Shelf life given by all sources based on maximum given shelf life

fields.label: Synonyms I Acronym I Chemicals names
Synonyms
fields.name: synonyms
fields.instructions: Add the filter search keywords for the Product, such as title (variations), synonyms, cas no. etc.

fields.label: Regulatory data
fields.name: regulatory_data
fields.instructions: Save underlaying documents on the server
